summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; accepting a $15,000 contribution from the SHA for capital improvements at Puget Ridge, which is located on property owned by Seattle Housing Authority and leased to the Department of Parks and Recreation; increasing the expenditure allowance in the Department's 1997 Budget, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
